text: Manuel Carlos Mouriño Atanes (born 4 March 1943) is a Spanish-Mexican businessman. He has been president of the football club RC Celta de Vigo since 2006. His son was politician Juan Camilo (1971–2008). Mouriño returned to Galicia in 2000, becoming a board member at Celta in 2003 and president in 2006. ==References== ==Other websites== *BBC, Profile: Juan Camilo Mourino * The Times: Juan Camilo Mouriño: Mexican politician Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:People from Campeche Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:Mexican businesspeople
title: Carlos Mouriño
